#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define MOD 10000 
 
bool flag[500005];
int ans[500005];
 
int main() {
	
	int T, N, i, j;
	
	for(i=1; i<=500000; i++)
	    ans[i] = 1;
	
	for(i=2; i<=500000; i++)
	{
	    for(j=2*i; j<=500000; j+=i)
	    {
	        if(i>=MOD)
	        {
	            flag[j] = 1;
	        }
	        
	        ans[j] = ans[j]*(i%MOD);
	        
	        if(ans[j]>=MOD)
	        {
	            ans[j]%= MOD;
	            flag[j] = 1;
	        }
	    }
	}
	
	scanf("%d", &T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
	    scanf("%d", &N);
	    
	    if(flag[N])
	        printf("%04d\n", ans[N]);
	    else
	        printf("%d\n", ans[N]);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
